entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matane

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
